column5: Come stay at our beautiful apartment in UTSA Boulevard. Close to UTSA, South Texas Medical Center, La Cantera, Six Flags, The Rim and great restaurants, bars and cafes. Its only 15 minutes away from the airport and Boerne, 20 minutes away from Downtown or Medina Lake. Also its 3 minutes away with the bikes from the trails of San Antonio.
column8: SIX FLAGS, SEA WORLD, UTSA, MEDICAL CENTER,CANTERA
